laptops.name: Alienware M15 R5
laptops.longDescription: The Alienware M15 R5 is a powerful gaming laptop with an Intel Core i7 processor, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 graphics, and 16GB of RAM. The 15.6-inch display has a refresh rate of 144Hz for smooth gameplay.

laptops.name: Dell XPS 13
laptops.longDescription: The Dell XPS 13 is a premium ultrabook with a 10th-gen Intel Core i7 processor, 16GB of RAM, and a 512GB SSD. The 13.3-inch display has a resolution of 3840x2160 and covers 100% of the sRGB color gamut.

laptops.name: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon

laptops.name: HP Envy x360
laptops.longDescription: The HP Envy x360 is a versatile 2-in-1 laptop with a touchscreen display that can be flipped 360 degrees. It has an AMD Ryzen 7 processor, 16GB of RAM, and a 512GB SSD.

laptops.name: Acer Chromebook Spin 13
